text: Don Jon is a 2013 American romantic comedy-drama movie written and directed by Joseph Gordon-Levitt. It stars Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Scarlett Johansson, Julianne Moore, and Tony Danza. It was released to positive reviews on September 27, 2013. == Plot == Jon Martello is a young Italian-American and modern-day Don Juan living in New Jersey. He enjoys his independent life, which consists of working out, caring for his apartment, driving his 1972 Chevrolet Chevelle SS, going to church with his family, and engaging in a casual sex life. Though he enjoys sex, he is more satisfied by masturbating to hardcore pornography. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * * * Category:2013 romantic comedy movies Category:2013 romantic drama movies Category:2013 comedy-drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies set in New Jersey Category:Movies about pornography Category:American independent movies
title: Don Jon
